title: Flying Dragon
summaries: The Flying Dragon is a projectile sword which is dropped by Betsy during the Old One's Army event. It shoots crescent-shaped projectiles which travel through blocks and produce light. The projectiles can pierce through four enemies, dissipating after hitting the fifth enemy.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, the projectile will deal half the damage (90) if the player does not have a direct line of sight on it. However, in PvP, it will still deal full damage.

statistics.Damage: 180 / 90 (Melee)
statistics.Sell: 5
